title: Ultimate Omloop Het Nieuwsblad Guide: The Favorites, the Outsiders, the Tactics, TV Listings, and Maps
content:
Double-header weekend with Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne and Omloop van Het Hageland on Sunday to deliver sparks for specialists and sprinters alike. Here are all the course details and maps.

Read the full article at Ultimate Omloop Het Nieuwsblad Guide: The Favorites, the Outsiders, the Tactics, TV Listings, and Maps on Velo.
author: ahood
